CheckTitle: Ensure Guest User Role ID is Set to a Most Restrictive Value
Description: Checks if the Guest User Role ID is set to a most restrictive value in the tenant.
Risk: If the Guest User Role ID is not set to a most restrictive value, guest users may have more permissions than intended, increasing risk.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Azure Portal (https://portal.azure.com). 2. Navigate to Azure Active Directory > External Identities > External collaboration settings. 3. Set Guest user access to the most restrictive option.

Recommendation.Text: Set the Guest User Role ID to a most restrictive value to limit guest user permissions.

Notes: This check validates that the Guest User Role ID is set to a most restrictive value in the tenant.
